inclusion.criterion: intra or extrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma confirmed by biopsy/brushings, biliary aneuploidy demonstrated by FISH, or elevated CA 19-9 greater than 100 ng/mL in the presence of a radiographic malignant stricture
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas

inclusion.criterion: deemed surgically unresectable by a surgical oncologist
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: malignant disease encompassable within a single radiation field
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: laboratory values: Hemoglobin ≥ 8.0 (can be transfused to attain this value)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: chemotherapy within one month of starting radiation therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: uncontrolled infection or severe active comorbid disease
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous malignancy in the past five years, excluding nonmelanoma skin cancers and in situ cervical, bladder or uterine cancer
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: distant metastatic disease (outside regional lymph nodes)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas and a splenic flecture/pancreatic tail mass likely diverticular abscess given recent history of diverticulitis. She was treated with IV antibiotics.
